actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the small Business Act to provide loans for making payments on mortgages to small businesses adversely affected by the energy crisis.

summary.text: Provides loans under the Small Business Act for making payments on mortgages to small businesses adversely affected by the energy crisis. (Amends 15 U.S.C. 636 (b))

titles.title: A bill to amend the small Business Act to provide loans for making payments on mortgages to small businesses adversely affected by the energy crisis.
